item.description: Come join us for a casual, non-competitive opportunity to enjoy the early Fall outdoors; get some exercise and take out your agressions on a tiny white ball. Event Description: Continuing our legacy in Sitz to offer exciting events for our members and guests who are interested in enjoying quality time and friendship. This year, we offer Sitz Golf in October! This is a nine-hole, best ball tournament (you do not have to know how to play golf to enjoy this event). The tournament is followed by a cookout in the Patriot Golf Course Pavilion followed by camaraderie…and of course a little drink. The membership cost for golf and cookout is $45 and the guest cost for golf and cookout is $45. RSVPs by Sept25 manditory. Paypay is NOT available for this event
item.name: How's your swing? Casual, non-competitive Golf with BBQ
